item.description:
http://www.coolidge.org/content/master
Come check out The Master, about an intellectual who starts a faith-based organization and unexpectedly ends up being thought of as a prophet. I saw Philip Seymour Hoffman on Colbert and it seems thought-provoking and weird. (just like me!)

Folks must purchase their own tickets in advance (you can use the link above). Let's meet at 11:45 to ensure some good seats for our Atheist butts.
item.name: See Philip Seymour Hoffman's new movie The Master
